hooks.command: cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/rust" && cargo fmt --quiet 2>/dev/null; cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/flutter/packages/integrations_client" && dart format . --quiet 2>/dev/null; exit 0

file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '(\.env|\.env\.|Cargo\.lock|pubspec\.lock|\.git/)'; then echo "Blocked: Cannot modify $file_path" >&2; exit 2; fi; exit 0
